description:
Nowadays,more and more people,especially young people, use WeChat as their major communication channel.According to a recent survey conducted by press reports,a high proportion college students admit that they understanding the information through WeChat every day,such as photos shared on the Moments,advertisements of products sold by friends,and so on.
    We are analysed now why can appear such phenomenon.The reason for this is not far to seek.First of all,with the WeChat, the way of our lives, learning, work and play has been facilitated.What’s more,compared with the give others a call,WeChat is free with WIFI,which is more economical for students.Even though there is plenty of evidence that WeChat has made our life more convenient and colorful by its functions,it can also be a negative force if unreasonably,such as,many people are so absorbed that they waste lots of time.there are an increasing number of victims who have been cheated or fooled.
    As for me,I prefer using WeChat.I also hope that some measures could be taken to punish those who cheat through WeChat so that we can enjoy the modern information technology safely and reassured.
  
可以使用的句子
   如果有些事情滞后了，微信可以帮助我与它们取得联系。
   If someone lags behind, Wechat can help me get in touch with them.
   而且只要你愿意，随时都可以用微信聊天。
   And you can talk whenever you want.
   除了微博，微信也是一个暗藏商机的平台。
   Besides micro blogs, WeChat is another platform that can be used for business.
